There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around October 8th 2011
Summary: I saw a string of bright lights, about 6-10 flying in a formation shaped like a
divs: Sighting DetailsOn Oct 8th I was driving home around 8PM Central time. I was east bound on I-44 nearing the intersection of I-270 and noticed several bright lights (6-10)flying together. At first, I thought they were aircraft approaching Lambert Airport, but then I realized they were to close together. The objects were close together and were in formation. A straight line that tailed off, like a reverse "J" shape. I tried to watch and keep my eyes on the road, as best I could. When I turned Northbound on I-270 the lights passed above my car and I lost visual contact at that time. The total time was about 1-2 minutes.
